channel.title: ProjectRs06 - Leak - Full 2006 Scape Source
channel.description:
[QUOTE]
Paypal dispute for work done:
Quote The Developer was paid to do some SQL database work but never completed the work correctly. He ended up released the websites user database which contained passwords. This could actually be a criminal offence. Skype:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/13RxKum.png[/img]
As a result, here is the PRS06 source. Since it is not theirs, they have no copywrite in place, I signed no contracts saying I wouldn't release it, and I'm not scared of that 420 blazing moron anyway so here you go: Download rs06.rar @ UppIT
Note to mods: Remove the link if it is not allowed, but please keep the post since it is personal life and not server versus server related.
So here's my payback for gaining back your money, you lose even more! This includes the work I did.[/QUOTE]
Enjoy guys, :) Good bye remakes hello 2007 runescape.
